sent-email.legend: Has the home office sent you an email

email.label: Email address
email.hint: We will reply to this email address

question.label: Enter your question below. Provide as much detail as possible

contacted.legend: The Home Office conducts research about experiences using products and services. Would you like to be contacted further about your experience using this service
contacted.hint: IF you agree to take part in the future research blah blah blah...

start1.paragraph-1: This application must be completed by anyone who applies to work for Border Force.
start1.paragraph-2: You have 5 working days from the day you were first sent a link to the service to complete your application.
start1.paragraph-3: We will use the answers you provide in this application for security checks that you must pass in order to be offered employment with Border Force.
start1.paragraph-4: To be offered a position, you must also pass United Kingdom Security Vetting (UKSV) and standard pre-employment and right to work checks.
start1.paragraph-5: If you fail one of these checks, your job offer with Border Force will be withdrawn.
start1.paragraph-6: Border Force is entitled to expect staff to have high standards and integrity. If relevant information in this application has not been declared, this may bring into question someone's honesty and trustworthiness. This can lead to clearance being refused. You therefore must be thorough, open and sincere.
start1.paragraph-7: If you declare something which is irrelevant, it will be discounted.
